page.title: 14Religious Beliefs.
page.content:
On July 9th we surveyed the religious beliefs of 40 people divided into four age groups:0-20,21-40,41-60,61and over.In the age group 0-20,30% were Church of England,10% Muslim and 10% Hindu. 40% believed in God but did not follow any particular religion.Only 10% did not believe in God.In the age group 21-40,30% didn't believe in God, 30% believed in God but didn't follow a religion,30% were C.of E. and 10% Hindu .In the 41-60 group,60% were C.of E.10% Church of Scotland and 10% Hindu.40% elieved in God and 10% in nothing.We concluded that people between 41 and 60 were the most religious and those etween 21 and 40,the least.
Pupils -St.Thomas More School.
